message: I want to order 2 margheritas and 3 pepperoni pizzas

To place your order, please provide your NYU ID, building number, and phone number in the following format:

- NYU ID: 8 digits (e.g., 12345678)
- Building Number: A1A, A2B, etc. (e.g., A1A)
- Phone Number: UAE format (e.g., +971555555555)

Do you have any special requests for your order? (like extra toppings, dietary restrictions, etc.)

Once I have all the necessary information, I can help guide you through the ordering process. If you need assistance with the format or have questions about anything else, feel free to ask!
Yes, how much will the order total be
